info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 3:39PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...LINE OF THUNDERSTORMS WORKING EAST ALONG THE UTAH BORDER INTO ONEIDA COUNTY TOWARD THE MALAD AND SAMARIA AREA THROUGH 500 PM MDT... At 332 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of showers and thunderstorms extending from 14 miles east of Malta to 12 miles northwest of Juniper moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Brief moderate rain and wind gusts to 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Moderate rain may cause reduced visibility. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Fire crews working near the Wood Canyon Burn should be prepared for gusty and erratic thunderstorm outflow winds and moderate rain by 5 PM MDT.
